name: Ghost Rush: Winter Edition
description:
Shoemaker's Last proudly presents:  Ghost Rush: Winter Edition!

Game play is deceptively simple. You control a ghost that is in constant motion along a circular path. The left joystick button is the only control. Press it to change directions. Collect the snowballs for points... but avoid falling icicles coming at you from the top, and later enemies from the sides!

Ghost Rush: Winter Edition runs on a 64K CoCo 1 or 2, or a CoCo 3. On a CoCo 3 only, pressing [P] on the title screen will cycle through different color sets for both RGB and composite monitors.

The game is in 100% machine language using a 128x96 hires graphics mode in 4 colors.

Many thanks to Steve Bjork for sharing his random number generator routine, and to Rick Adams for sharing his 4-voice music routine.

After downloading from the link below, insert or mount the disk and type LOADM"GRWIN" followed by EXEC to start!
